pullrequest.title: [Gazebo9] Fixing paths related issues on Windows build.

content.raw:
## CI results

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/775/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/1020/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1653/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2446/

there are a few style complaints reported by the Ubuntu builds related to line length > 80 characters. unfortunately, there is a bug in our jenkins system that doesn't display the style complaints on the website, but I can paste them here instead:

~~~
gazebo/common/Plugin.hh:169:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:506:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
gazebo/rendering/RTShaderSystem.cc:98:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
gazebo/rendering/RenderEngine.cc:623:  Lines should very rarely be longer than 100 characters  [whitespace/line_length] [4]
~~~
content.html:

there are a few style complaints reported by the Ubuntu builds related to line length > 80 characters. unfortunately, there is a bug in our jenkins system that doesn't display the style complaints on the website, but I can paste them here instead:

gazebo/common/Plugin.hh:169:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
gazebo/rendering/Heightmap.cc:506:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
